metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4554 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The OpenID module in Drupal 7.x before 7.16 allows remote OpenID servers to read arbitrary files via a crafted DOCTYPE declaration in an XRDS file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1.1').
